statements.select: SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherExitMaterial WHERE ((ProduceOtherExitMaterialDate>=#startdate# OR #startdate# IS NULL) AND (ProduceOtherExitMaterialDate<=#enddate# OR #enddate# IS NULL)) AND (SupplierId IN (SELECT SupplierId FROM Supplier WHERE (Id>=#sid1# OR #sid1# IS AND (Id<=#sid2# OR #sid2# IS NULL)NULL)) OR SupplierId IS NULL)
